name: SplitButton
description: SplitButton groups a set of commands in an overlay with a default command.

model.label: model
model.title: MenuModel instance to define the overlay items.

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

append-to.label: appendTo
append-to.title:
A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the overlay gets attached.
Special keywords are 'body' for document body and 'self' for the element itself.

disabled.label: disabled
disabled.title: When present, it specifies that the element should be disabled.

button-props.label: buttonProps
button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the default button.

menu-button-props.label: menuButtonProps
menu-button-props.title: Used to pass all properties of the HTMLButtonElement to the menu button.

menu-button-icon.label: menuButtonIcon
menu-button-icon.title: Name of the menu button icon.

severity.label: severity
severity.title: Defines the style of the button.

raised.label: raised
raised.title: Add a shadow to indicate elevation.

rounded.label: rounded
rounded.title: Add a circular border radius to the button.

text.label: text
text.title: Add a textual class to the button without a background initially.

outlined.label: outlined
outlined.title: Add a border class without a background initially.

size.label: size
size.title: Defines the size of the button.

plain.label: plain
plain.title: Add a plain textual class to the button without a background initially.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

pt-options.label: ptOptions
pt-options.title: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: default
slots.title: Button part of the content can easily be customized with the default slot instead of using the built-in modes.

slots.name: buttoncontent
slots.title: Command button part of the content can easily be customized with the button content slot.

slots.name: item
slots.title: Custom content for each menu item.
